fulltext:
CV APPLY FOR DEVELOPER
Le Van Hoi
Date of birth: Oct 13, 1992
Gender:  Male
OBJECTIVE  
Become a Full stack Web Developer in the next year. 
Study more and more to improve my skills to become a Team Leader. 
EDUCATION 
9/2010 - 06/2015 
Academy of Cryptography Techniques 
 Major: information security 
SKILLS 
Technical Skills:
-PHP Framework: Codeigniter, Laravel, 
CachePHP.FuelPHP 
-PHP CMS: Wordpresss 
-Database: MySQL, Postgresql, oracle 
-Javascript framework: JQuery, ReacJs, Nodejs. 
-CSS: CSS, CSS3, SASS, Bootstrap 
-Web server: Apache, Nginx 
-Operating Systems: Windows, Linux, MacOS 
-Version control: Git- Tool / software: PhpStorm, Sublime
text, 
Sequel Pro… 
-Social API: Facebook, Goolge, Twitter. 
Key Skills: 
-I have more than 1 year experience as project leader. 
-Hands on experience in using Laravel / CakePHP/ 
FuelPHP  to develop a web application. 
-Good Work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript (Jquery, Ajax),
Bootstrap, JSON, XML 
-Understanding MVC Framework, ORM, RESTful, OOP,
DesignPattern. 
-Hands on experience in developing the Restful API 
system. 
-Implementation / Maintenance Support in PHP and 
MySQL - Have knowledge,experience and master the 
MYSQL database. 
-Have knowledge about web server, can use nginx 
proficiency, apache. 
-Good in teamwork. 
-Database design suitable for requirements, optimized for 
performance. 
-Proficient in source code manage tools: GIT. 
Language 
Vietnamese, English 
WORK EXPERIENCE  
Company : VES (1/2015 - 4/2015)

 None

 Intern 
My responsibilities 
-Develop a backend system for the project. 
-Design the font-end interface for the application. 
Technologies used 
 CodeIgniter, javascript, html, css.
